listitem.para: Ensure that you've uninstalled any already installed Visual C++. These instructions are based on the Visual C++ Express downloaded installer vs the CD installer.
Launch the VCSetup.exe setup file and click "Next".
Read the license agreement, select "I accept the agreement" and click "Next".
Select the "Graphical IDE" option and click "Next".
Change the install directory shown above to "C:\VS8" as shown below and click "Install":
Click "Register Now" link and follow the instructions to register. Once the registration process is started you can close this installer window by clicking "Exit".

note.para: If you do a repair or reinstall via the "Add or Remove Programs" control panel you will need to register again and it will be most likely a different registration code as the original registration code will not work.

listitem.para: This completes the basic Visual C++ Express installation.
